message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split reflects the urgency for me to settle due to inflation.
Considering the inflation rates, I believe this is a more balanced offer.
The inflation is working against me more than you, Bob. I need a larger share to make it worthwhile to continue.
Given the increasing impact of inflation on your share, I think this split is becoming more reasonable.
Bob, it's clear we both value our positions. Let's stop wasting time as the inflation hurts us both. I propose an even split.
